content: beak should have 2 triangles sew the smaller one onto the larger one note if you want your falcon to have an open mouth then do not sew the two triangles to each other wings make 2 if you want your wings to be more textured then youcan do flo one row and then blo the next row andso on but switch which row you do the blo and the floon for the left and right wings use the same colour that you used on the body row 1 chain 21 starting in the 2nd chain from hook sc20 turn~20 r0w 2 chain 1 single_crochet 20 turn~20 r0w 3 chain 1 single_crochet 20 through the last row that you worked and the original 20 chain~15 row 4 chain 17 starting in the 2nd chain from hook sl st4 single_crochet 10 slip_stitch 2 turn~16 row 5 chain 1 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 10 chain 6 turn~18 row 6 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 4 single_crochet 11 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet back into the wire covering turn~18 row 7 chain 1 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 12 chain 6 turn~20 row 8 starting in the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 4 sc13 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet back into the wire cowering turn~19 row 9 chain 1 single_crochet 15 chain 4 turn~19 row10 starting in the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 3 single_crochet 11 turn~14 row 11 chain 1 single_crochet 9 chain 4 turn~13 row 12 starting in the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 3 single_crochet 5 slip_stitch 4 single_crochet 2 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet into the wire covering turn~17 row 13 chain 1 single_crochet 12 chain 3 turn~15 row 14 starting in the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 8 turn~10 row 15 chain 1 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 2 slip_stitch 4 single_crochet 2 sl st2 single_crochet back into the wire covering turn~12 row 16 chain 1 single_crochet 6 chain 4 turn~10 row 17 starting in the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 3 single_crochet 6 skip one of the sts in the wire covering andthen single_crochet into the next one turn~9 row 18 chain 1 single_crochet 7 chain 4 turn~11 row 19 starting in the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 3 sc7 skip one of the sts in the wire covering and thensc into the next one turn~10 row 20-23 repeat row 16-19 row 24 chain 1 single_crochet 5 chain 3 turn~8 row 25 starting in the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 5 skip one of the sts in the wire covering andthen single_crochet into the next one turn~8 row 26 chain 1 single_crochet 4 chain 3 turn~7 row 27 starting in the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 4 skip one of the sts in the wire covering andthen single_crochet into the next one turn~7 row 28-29 repeat row 26-27 fo leaving a 24in tail for sewing onto the body ofthe fa finished photos
